assignments.name: Amount_Greater_Than_Zero_Fault_Message
assignments.label: Amount Greater Than Zero Fault Message

value.stringValue: Checkout link is unavailable for Quarterly or Semi annual.

rules.name: ISEMEAOppty
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 or 3 or 4 or 5 or 6 or 7)
rules.label: ISEMEAOppty

Flow.description: ADDED Invalid Shipping Contact" on the Checkout Link Validation Flow GTMS-5514
Flow.label: Checkout Link Validation

fields.name: AmountNotGreaterThan0
fields.fieldText:
﻿VALIDATION FAILED


AMOUNT MUST BE GREATER THAN 0.

fields.name: CountryHeaderInvalid
fields.fieldText: INVALID COUNTRY SELECTED

fields.name: CountryBad
fields.fieldText:
Country selected is unsupported.

Country Selected:

{!thisAccount.BillingCountry}

fields.name: UKOpps_1
fields.fieldText: Validations specific to opportunities in: {!thisAccount.BillingCountry}

fields.name: UKAmount_1
fields.fieldText: First Payment amount must be <= $175k: {!thiscpqopp.First_Months_Payment__c}

fields.name: BillingState_1
fields.fieldText: Account's Billing State can't be null. Current billing state: {!thisAccount.BillingState}

fields.name: ShippingMissingOnOpp
fields.fieldText:
WARNING!!!!!

Manual Shipping and Handling is on the CPQ quote but not the opp! From the quote: {!thiscpqopp.Shipping_and_Handling_Manual__c}

fields.name: Prerequisites
fields.fieldText:
﻿CHECKOUT LINK VALIDATION


Listed below is the criteria needed to populate the checkout link, if you see a field highlighted in red you need to go back to the relevant object and fix the issue. If its all green, you should be good to go.


The current billing country is: {!thisAccount.BillingCountry}



------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

fields.name: Currency_check
fields.fieldText:
Account Currency: {!thisAccount.CurrencyIsoCode}


Opportunity Currency: {!thisOpportunity.CurrencyIsoCode}


If these two do not match, please head to either the Account or Opportunity and update before proceeding.

fields.name: shipping_and_handling_check
fields.fieldText: Invalid Shipping and Handling cost, please ask SalesOps to update the Shipping and Handling Manual field on the Opportunity and/or Quote.

fields.name: pqtitle
fields.fieldText: Primary Quote Criteria

fields.name: reverttoquote
fields.fieldText:
Please revert to the Primary quote to fix the errors below:

https://samsara--uat.my.salesforce.com/{!thiscpqopp.Id}

fields.name: approved
fields.fieldText: VALID QUOTE STATUS: {!thiscpqopp.ApprovalStatus__c}

fields.name: notapproved
fields.fieldText:
INVALID QUOTE STATUS: {!thiscpqopp.ApprovalStatus__c}


In order to generate a checkout link the Primary Quote must be set to a status of "Approved".

fields.name: salestax0
fields.fieldText: ﻿VALID SALES TAX: {!thiscpqopp.Sales_Tax__c}

fields.name: salestaxgreaterthan0
fields.fieldText:
INVALID SALES TAX:{!thiscpqopp.Sales_Tax__c}


Your Sales Tax Rate will need to be 0% unless you are shipping from the UK.

fields.name: opptitle
fields.fieldText: Opportunity Criteria

fields.name: linktoopp
fields.fieldText:
Please revert to the Opp to fix the errors below:

https://samsara--uat.my.salesforce.com/{!thisOpportunity.Id}

fields.name: valid_prob
fields.fieldText: VALID PROBABILITY: {!thisOpportunity.Probability}

fields.name: probablity
fields.fieldText: INVALID PROBABILITY: Probability must be >50%. Currently: {!thisOpportunity.Probability}

fields.name: Shipping_Contact
fields.fieldText: INVALID SHIPPING CONTACT: {!ShippingContactNotNull}

fields.name: shipping_hand_good
fields.fieldText: VALID SHIPPING AND HANDLING: {!thisOpportunity.Shipping_and_Handling__c}

fields.name: inv_shipping
fields.fieldText: INVALID SHIPPING AND HANDLING: Shipping and Handling can't be blank or $99999.99. Currently: {!thisOpportunity.Shipping_and_Handling__c}

fields.name: val_shipping_addy
fields.fieldText:
VALID SHIPPING ADDRESS:


{!thisOpportunity.Shipping_Address_NEW__c}

fields.name: inv_shipping_addy
fields.fieldText: INVALID SHIPPING ADDRESS: Shipping Address can't be null.

fields.name: val_sales_tax
fields.fieldText: VALID SALES TAX: {!thisOpportunity.Sales_Tax__c}

fields.name: inv_Sales_tax
fields.fieldText: INVALID SALES TAX: Sales Tax must be zero.

fields.name: resellpartner
fields.fieldText: Opportunity cannot be a reseller opportunity

fields.name: Net_Terms
fields.fieldText: Opportunity cannot be on Net Terms

fields.name: acctitle
fields.fieldText: Account Criteria

fields.name: backtoaccount
fields.fieldText:
Please revert to the Account to fix the errors below:

https://samsara--uat.my.salesforce.com/{!thisAccount.Id}

fields.name: valid_bfirst
fields.fieldText: VALID BILLING FIRST NAME: {!thisAccount.Billing_First_Name__c}

fields.name: inv_bill_first
fields.fieldText: INVALID BILLING FIRST NAME: Billing First Name on Account must be set

fields.name: val_blast
fields.fieldText: VALID BILLING LAST NAME: {!thisAccount.Billing_Last_Name__c}

fields.name: inv_billlast
fields.fieldText: INVALID BILLING LAST NAME: Billing Last Name must be set.

fields.name: val_billemail
fields.fieldText: VALID BILLING EMAIL: {!thisAccount.Billing_Email__c}

fields.name: inv_billemail
fields.fieldText: INVALID BILLING EMAIL: Billing Email on Account must be set.

fields.name: val_billphone
fields.fieldText: VALID BILLING PHONE: {!thisAccount.Billing_Phone__c}

fields.name: inv_billphone
fields.fieldText: INVALID BILLING PHONE: Billing Phone on Account must be set.

fields.name: val_billstreet
fields.fieldText: VALID BILLING STREET: {!thisAccount.BillingStreet}

fields.name: inv_billstreet
fields.fieldText: INVALID BILLING STREET: Billing Street on Account must be set.

fields.name: val_billcity
fields.fieldText: VALID BILLING CITY: {!thisAccount.BillingCity}

fields.name: inv_billcity
fields.fieldText: INVALID BILLING CITY: Billing City on Account must be set.

fields.name: val_billcode
fields.fieldText: VALID BILLING POST CODE: {!thisAccount.BillingPostalCode}

fields.name: inv_billpostcode
fields.fieldText: INVALID BILLING POST CODE: Billing Post Code on Account must be set.

fields.name: Invalid_state
fields.fieldText: INVALID STATE PLEASE REMOVE: {!thisAccount.BillingState}

fields.name: CPQOpptyScreen
fields.fieldText:
WARNING

THIS IS A CPQ OPPORTUNITY


Please ensure the conditions below are met before proceeding!


1) Quote Status = "Approved"

Current Quote Status:

{!thiscpqopp.SBQQ__Status__c}

2) Approval Status = "Approved"

3) Sales Tax Amount is calculated and >0.

fields.name: Stripe_val
fields.fieldText:
Stripe Payment Validation


An Error on this page will not prevent the checkout link from showing however it may affect the customers payment being processed if it is above the threshold.

fields.name: first_month_payment
fields.fieldText: First Payment: €{!thiscpqopp.First_Months_Payment__c}

fields.name: Amount
fields.fieldText: Please be aware that the First Payment Amount must be <= €200k if paying via SEPA or <= €40k if paying via Credit Card

fields.name: checkoutlink
fields.fieldText:
﻿Your Checkout link should now appear here:


{!thisOpportunity.Checkout_Agreement_Link__c}



If it is blank, please revert to the previous page and ensure that there are no checks marked as red

fields.name: ExpressHeader
fields.fieldText: Express Opportunity Validation

fields.name: SupportedCountries
fields.fieldText: Supported Countries: United States, Canada, Mexico, United Kingdom, Ireland, France, Germany, Belgium, Netherlands, Spain

fields.name: CurrenctCountry
fields.fieldText: Current Country: {!thisAccount.BillingCountry}

fields.name: ShippingNotNull
fields.fieldText: Shipping Address must not be NULL: {!thisOpportunity.Shipping_Address_NEW__c}

fields.name: ShippingContactNotNull
fields.fieldText: Shipping Contact must not be NULL: {!thisOpportunity.Shipping_Contact__c}

fields.name: ExpressAmountNotNUll
fields.fieldText: Amount must be >0: {!thisOpportunity.Amount}

fields.name: LicenseDueNotNull
fields.fieldText: License Due must be >0: {!thisOpportunity.Total_License_Due__c}

fields.name: Express_Selected_Discount
fields.fieldText: Express Selected Discount must not be NULL: {!thisOpportunity.Express_Selected_Discount__c}

fields.name: UnsupportedPricebook
fields.fieldText:
ERROR: Pricebook Selected is Unsupported.


Pricebook must be one of the pricebooks listed below


Standard

Samsara FY22

fields.name: Failed
fields.fieldText: An unexpected error occurred: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Um1
fields.fieldText: An unexpected error occurred: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: PaymentTermsNoPresent
fields.fieldText:

fields.name: UKOpps
fields.fieldText:
Stripe Payment Validation


An Error on this page will not prevent the checkout link from showing however it may affect the customers payment being processed if it is above the threshold.

fields.name: first_month_pay
fields.fieldText: First Payment: €{!thiscpqopp.First_Months_Payment__c}

fields.name: UKAmount
fields.fieldText: Please be aware that the First Payment Amount must be <= £200k if paying via SEPA or <= £40k if paying via Credit Card

fields.name: checkout
fields.fieldText:
﻿Your Checkout link should now appear here:


{!thisOpportunity.Checkout_Agreement_Link__c}



If it is blank, please revert to the previous page and ensure that there are no checks marked as red

fields.fieldText:

fields.name: MidmarketValidation
fields.fieldText: Midmarket Opportunity Validation

fields.name: BillingCountry
fields.fieldText:
PREREQUISITES:

The following billing countries are currently supported by the MM checkout:

United States, United Kingdom, France, Germany, Belgium, Spain, Netherlands, Ireland, Canada, Mexico, Switzerland


The current billing country is: {!thisAccount.BillingCountry}

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Account Currency must match Opportunity Currency

Account Currency: {!thisAccount.CurrencyIsoCode} Opportunity Currency: {!thisOpportunity.CurrencyIsoCode}

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Opportunity cannot be a reseller opportunity.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

fields.name: FieldsonOpp
fields.fieldText:
Fields on the Opportunity with Errors

If no errors appear below, opportunity is good to go!

fields.name: ProbabilityDisplay
fields.fieldText: INVALID PROBABILITY: Probability must be >50%. Currently: {!thisOpportunity.Probability}

fields.name: ShippingandHandling
fields.fieldText: INVALID SHIPPING AND HANDLING: Shipping and Handling can't be blank or $99999.99. If you see 99999.99, please reach out to orders-requests@samsara.com to update the shipping/handling fee. Currently: {!thisOpportunity.Shipping_and_Handling__c}

fields.name: ShippingContact
fields.fieldText: INVALID SHIPPING CONTACT: Shipping Contact must be populated for the checkout link to be populated.

fields.name: ShippingAddress
fields.fieldText: INVALID SHIPPING ADDRESS: Shipping Address NEW can't be blank.

fields.name: SalesTaxNotNull
fields.fieldText: INVALID SALES TAX: Sales Tax can't be blank.

fields.name: FieldsOnAccount
fields.fieldText:
Fields on the Account with Errors

If no errors appear below, opportunity is good to go!

fields.name: BillingFirstName
fields.fieldText: INVALID BILLING FIRST NAME. Billing First Name on Account must be set.

fields.name: BillingLastName
fields.fieldText: INVALID BILLING LAST NAME. Billing Last Name on Account must be set.

fields.name: BillingEmail

fields.name: BillingPhone
fields.fieldText: INVALID BILLING PHONE: Billing Phone on Account must be set.

fields.name: BillingCity
